sentences.en: Every traveller on the Grand Tour had to visit Florence.
sentences.cn: 每位游学旅行者都必得造访佛罗伦萨。

sentences.en: He devilled her during the tour.
sentences.cn: 他在旅行中拿她打趣逗乐。

sentences.en: He found the rigours of the tour too demanding.
sentences.cn: 他发现这次旅行非常艰苦。

sentences.en: I couldn't live my life out on tour like he does.
sentences.cn: 我没法像他那样一辈子到老都在各地巡回演出。

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: Sean O'Leary has been named in the England squad to tour Argentina.
sentences.cn: 肖恩·奥利里已入选参加阿根廷巡回赛的英格兰队大名单。

sentences.en: The last stop in Mr Cook's lengthy tour was Paris.
sentences.cn: 库克先生漫长旅程中的最后一站是巴黎。

sentences.en: The three acts will alternate as headliners throughout the tour.
sentences.cn: 这3个节目将在整个巡回演出中轮流打头牌。

sentences.en: The tour will include games against the Australian Barbarians.
sentences.cn: 这次巡回赛将包括和澳大利亚野人队的比赛。

sentences.en: There were mixed fortunes for French rugby teams on tour.
sentences.cn: 参加巡回比赛的法国橄榄球队成绩有喜有悲。

sentences.en: Tour operators may be forced to bite the bullet and cut prices.
sentences.cn: 旅行社的经营者们可能不得不忍痛降价。

sentences.en: Tour prices are being discounted as much as 33%.
We made a tour of the yacht, checking lashings and emergency gear.
sentences.cn: 我们在那艘游艇上四处看了看，检查了它的系索和应急装置。

sentences.en: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.cn: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

sentences.en: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.cn: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.en: We've arranged a walking tour of the city with your guide.
sentences.cn: 我们已安排大家在导游的带领下步行游览这座城市。

sentences.en: We’re touring the Greek islands this summer.
sentences.cn: 我们今年夏天去希腊的海岛旅游。

sentences.en: Win a trip to see the finish of the Tour de France!
sentences.cn: 赢得观看环法自行车赛最后阶段比赛之旅！

sentences.en: You can also tour the site on modern coaches equipped with videos.
sentences.cn: 您也可以乘坐配有视频设备的现代化长途汽车游览那处遗址。

words.tran_cn: 适宜游览的；游览者喜欢的；旅游者常去的
游览车；巡回演出者；观光客
旅行；作巡回演讲（tour的ing形式）
旅行，在……旅游；在……作巡回演出

phrases.tran_cn: 市区观光，城市观光；市内旅游
（从前英国贵族子女的）遍游欧洲大陆的教育旅行
包办旅行（路线、地点、时间和费用等均作统一规定和安排的旅游）
旅行社；包价旅游承办商

trans.tran_cn: 旅行，观光，巡回演出，任职期，轮班
trans.tran_en: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc
a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc
a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

trans.tran_cn: 旅行，在……旅游；在……作巡回演出
trans.tran_en: to visit several parts of a country or area
